com.android.iplayer.base

类 AbstractMediaPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.iplayer.base.AbstractMediaPlayer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IMediaPlayer
    直接已知子类:
    MediaPlayer

    public abstract class AbstractMediaPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMediaPlayer
    created by hty 2022/6/28 Desc:多媒体解码器基类，自定义多媒体解码器必须继承此类重写&&赋值所关心的监听器
